Caitiff:



The scanning mechanism of Caitiff's pod extended, soon detecting numerous 
lifeforms in the Congo's jungle in a five mile radius.  Randomly selecting a 
form, the scanning mechanism entered the pod.

A cycle later, the pod opened, Caitiff climbing out of the pod, shaking his 
head.  He had no idea where he was.
"Oh, by Primus, I'm gonna die...I'm gonna die!  On this useless jungle 
planet!" he activated his scanning equipment, and detected a base that gave 
off a Maximal energy-signature, not that far southeast.  
"Beast mode!" Caitiff transformed into his chimpanzee mode, climbing up a 
tree, soon swinging from the longer branches to other long branches, heading 
for the Cybertronian Fire.



Caitiff




Name: Caitiff
Gender: Male
Alternate Mode: Chimpanzee
Allegiance: Maximal


Description:


Character History:


Caitiff is fifty-six years in age, relatively young in Cybertronian society.  
Born in the province of Polyhex, he lived through a Predacon purge in Maximal 
law enforcement agents in that area.  Being an officer, he went out on the 
streets to combat this, and watched several of his best friends die in the 
line of duty.  When being pursued on foot, he hid in a corner, and nearly 
died, until military intervention stopped his demise.  Caitiff has been 
afraid of all Predacons ever since, and quit his job as an officer and became 
an electronic repair-bot, repairing broken stuff, and he also took up a hobby 
of Second and Third Cybertronian War equipment.  He can repair even the most 
damaged of stuff, as long as there's something to repair.


Character Personality:


A friendly robot, he is very likable.  But, unfortunately, he is a complete 
coward.  He is able to keep this kept hidden very well, but in a dangerous 
battle, he may lose it and could cost the life of a fellow Maximal.  


Character Stats:


Function: Equipment Repairs


Strength: 7.0
Speed: 5.5
Rank: 2.0
Firepower: 4.5
Intelligence: 9.0
Endurance: 6.0
Courage: 2.0
Skill: 10.0


Beast Mode Description:



As a chimpanzee, he is only three foot four (3 ft, four inches).  Relatively 
weak, this mode isn't all that helpful, except for a fast retreat in the 
trees.  Black eyes, and tannish skin, his hair is black.


Robot Mode Description:    



Brown, tawny, and black, he's a fearsome sight at 7 ft tall, somewhat 
surprising do to his nature.  Two blue Maximal symbols rest on his chest, 
almost invisible because of the hair covering his chest, abdomen, and arms.  
In his left hand, he carries a wrench.  In his right, he carries his tool 
box.  In subspace, he possesses a laser pistol, and  photon pistol, as well 
as a few spare tools.
